Class Proteus

java.lang.Object
io.github.kaktushose.proteus.Proteus
public class Proteus extends Object

The main entrypoint of the proteus library. Use this class to register Mappers or the convert Types.

global() will return a global proteus instance that is intended to be used across multiple frameworks or libraries using proteus to benefit from a shared pool of mappers. This is the intended way of using proteus.

Alternatively, call create() to create a new empty instance, or builder() for further configuration.

    • reconfigureCacheSize

      public void reconfigureCacheSize(int newSize)
      Adjusts the size of the underlying LRU-Cache used for caching paths. This will create a new cache object and erase the previous one.
      Parameters:
      newSize - the new cache size to use for the LRU-Cache

    • into

      @NotNull @SafeVarargs public final <T> @NotNull IntoMappingAction<T> into(Type<? extends T> into, Type<? extends T>... additional)
      Entrypoint for registering one or multiple Mappers for the given Type and its subtypes.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the Type
      Parameters:
      into - the Type
      additional - additional Types whose container types are a subtype of the container type of into
      Returns:
      a FromMappingAction to register one or multiple mappers for the given Types

    • register

      @NotNull public <S, T> @NotNull Proteus register(@NotNull @NotNull Type<S> from, @NotNull @NotNull Type<T> into, @NotNull @NotNull Mapper<S,T> mapper, @NotNull @NotNull Flag... flags)
      Registers a new conversion path from the given source Type from into the given destination Type into. If a path with the given source Type already exists, will use the configured conflictStrategy() of this proteus instance to resolve the conflict.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the from Type
      T - the type of into from Type
      Parameters:
      from - the source Type of the conversion path
      into - the destination Type of the conversion path
      mapper - the Mapper to associate with this conversion path
      flags - the Flags to register this mapper with

    • register

      @NotNull public <S, T> @NotNull Proteus register(@NotNull @NotNull Type<S> from, @NotNull @NotNull Type<T> into, @NotNull @NotNull Mapper<S,T> mapper, @NotNull ProteusBuilder.ConflictStrategy strategy, @NotNull @NotNull Flag... flags)
      Registers a new conversion path from the given source Type from into the given destination Type into. If a path with the given source Type already exists, will use the given ProteusBuilder.ConflictStrategy to resolve the conflict, overriding the configured conflictStrategy() of this proteus instance.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the from Type
      T - the type of into from Type
      Parameters:
      from - the source Type of the conversion path
      into - the destination Type of the conversion path
      mapper - the Mapper to associate with this conversion path
      strategy - the ProteusBuilder.ConflictStrategy to use if the from Type is already registered
      flags - the Flags to register this mapper with

    • existsPath

      public <S, T> boolean existsPath(@NotNull @NotNull Type<S> source, @NotNull @NotNull Type<T> target)
      Checks if a path between the given source and target type exists.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the source type
      T - the target type
      Parameters:
      source - the Type of the value to convert
      target - the Type to convert into
      Returns:
      true if a path exists, else false

    • convert

      @NotNull public <S, T> @NotNull ConversionResult<T> convert(@NotNull S value, @NotNull @NotNull Type<S> source, @NotNull @NotNull Type<T> target)
      Attempts to convert the source Type with the given value Proteus to the target Type. This will perform a lossy conversion, which means that some data might be lost during conversion. Use convert(Object, Type, Type, boolean) for lossless conversion.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the source type
      T - the target type
      Parameters:
      value - the value to convert
      source - the Type of the value to convert
      target - the Type to convert into
      Returns:
      a ConversionResult either holding the converted value or the error

    • convert

      @NotNull public <S, T> @NotNull ConversionResult<T> convert(@NotNull S value, @NotNull @NotNull Type<S> source, @NotNull @NotNull Type<T> target, boolean lossless)
      Attempts to convert the source Type with the given value Proteus to the target Type.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the source type
      T - the target type
      Parameters:
      value - the value to convert
      source - the Type of the value to convert
      target - the Type to convert into
      lossless - whether to convert lossless or not
      Returns:
      a ConversionResult either holding the converted value or the error
